title: Bootstrap Carousel
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Image Sliders
A slideshow component for cycling through elements.

### Structure
1. `.carousel.slide`: Outer wrapper.
2. `.carousel-inner`: Wrapper for slides.
3. `.carousel-item`: Individual slide.
4. `.active`: The visible slide.

### Controls
Prev/Next buttons using `data-bs-target="#id"` and `data-bs-slide="prev/next"`.
